    @allure.epic("Auction")
    @allure.feature("My Offers")
    @allure.story("Negative - Invalid query parameters")
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("query", [
        "?page=-1&size=20&type=lost",
        "?page=1&size=0&type=lost",
        "?page=1&size=20&type=invalid",
        "?page=&size=20&type=lost",
        "?page=1&size=&type=lost",
    ])
    def test_get_my_lost_offers_negative(dev_url, auth_headers, query):
        url = f"{dev_url}/api/auction/my/offers/{query}"
    
        with allure.step(f"Send GET request with invalid query: {query}"):
            response = requests.get(url, headers=auth_headers)
    
        with allure.step("Attach server response"):
            allure.attach(
                f"Status Code: {response.status_code}\nBody: {response.text}",
                name="Server response",
                attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT
            )
    
        with allure.step("Expect 4xx client error or valid empty response"):
            if response.status_code == 200:
                data = response.json()
                assert "results" in data
                assert isinstance(data["results"], list)
            else:
